trans-unit.source: Specifies an <see langword="abstract" /> class that when implemented represents security token parameters.
Security token parameters provide information about the tokens (for example, token type, issuer, and so on) required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖參數會提供安全性繫結項目所需要的權杖的相關資訊，例如，權杖型別、簽發者等。

trans-unit.source: The security token parameter classes derived from this one are a collection of token properties and methods, and are used in creating different kinds of security binding elements and tokens.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個類別的安全性權杖參數類別是權杖屬性及方法的集合，而且會用於建立各種不同的安全性繫結項目和權杖。

trans-unit.source: Not all of the properties are relevant to all derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的屬性都和衍生類別有關。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> has no relevance in an issued token (SAML token) case.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在核發的權杖 (SAML 權杖) 案例中，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> 就沒有任何關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows a custom override of this class called *CreditCardTokenParameters*.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範這個類別的自訂覆寫*CreditCardTokenParameters*。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> class.
The difference between these overloads is where instance property values come from.
trans-unit.target: 這些多載之間的差異就是執行個體屬性值的來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> sets them to their default values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> 會將這些差異設定成它們的預設值，

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> takes them from the instance referenced by the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> 則是從輸入參數所參考的執行個體中取用這些差異值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> class.
The new instance property values are set to their defaults:
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體的屬性值會設定為預設值：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> 設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The other instance of this class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> class from another instance.
The new instance property values are set to the corresponding values in `other`.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體屬性值會設定為 `other` 中的對應值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="other" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A copy of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> instance.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> methods follow the Core design pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> 方法符合核心設計模式。

trans-unit.source: In that pattern, this method performs some validation and then calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>, which is an `abstract` method that is overridden in derived classes to perform the core functionality.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式中，這個方法會執行某種驗證，然後呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>，而這是一個要在衍生類別中覆寫以執行核心功能的 `abstract` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Unable to clone this instance of the class.
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> instance that represents the copy.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> methods follow the Core design pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> 方法符合核心設計模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> is an `abstract` method that is overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> 是`abstract`衍生的類別中覆寫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The token.
The reference style of the security token.
Creates a key identifier clause for a token.
The key identifier clause for a token.
This method must be implemented in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在衍生類別中實作這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the token has an asymmetric key.
<see langword="true" /> if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果權杖具有非對稱金鑰，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically.
trans-unit.target: 非對稱金鑰會用於公開金鑰加密中，而這種加密方式會使用兩種在數學上相關的金鑰：公開金鑰和私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 公開金鑰會廣泛地散發，但是私密金鑰則不會公開。

trans-unit.source: In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.
trans-unit.target: 在公開金鑰加密中，不需要交換共同金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the token inclusion requirements.
The token inclusion requirements.
trans-unit.target: 權杖包含需求。

trans-unit.source: The token inclusion requirements specify whether the token needs to be serialized as part of the request and response.
trans-unit.target: 權杖包含需求會指定權杖是否必須序列化為要求與回應的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> enumeration has the following values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>列舉型別具有下列值：

trans-unit.source: The requirement of the security token.
When overridden in a derived class, initializes a security token requirement.
The token requirement is provided as input to the security token manager to obtain a security token provider or security token authenticator for the token.
trans-unit.target: 權杖需求是當做輸入提供給安全性權杖管理員，以便為權杖取得安全性權杖提供者或安全性權杖驗證器。

trans-unit.source: The security token.
The specified key identifier clause.
The reference style of the security token.
Indicates whether a token matches a key identifier clause.
<see langword="true" /> if the token matches the key identifier clause; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.

<paramref name="referenceStyle" /> is not <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.External" /> or <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal" />.
Gets or sets the token reference style.
The reference style for the token.
trans-unit.target: 權杖參考樣式。

trans-unit.source: The token reference style specifies how to refer to the token in the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 權杖參考樣式會指定如何參考 SOAP 訊息中的權杖。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a member of an enumeration that sets the desired referencing style that is used to generate security token references (STR) to the security tokens from the signature and encryption elements in the message.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回列舉的成員，這個列舉會設定由訊息中的簽章及加密項目產生安全性權杖的安全性權杖參考 (STR) 時所需使用的參考樣式。

trans-unit.source: An invalid token reference style was <see langword="set" />.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether keys can be derived from the original proof keys.
<see langword="true" /> if keys need to be derived from the token's key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須從權杖的金鑰衍生金鑰，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] needs to derive keys from the token's key when performing signature and encryption using the token.
trans-unit.target: 當使用權杖執行簽章和加密時，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 必須從權杖的金鑰衍生金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Derived keys originate in Secure Conversations where there is a shared security context so that the same security can be applied across all messages in the conversation.
trans-unit.target: 衍生金鑰的來源是「安全對話」，其中會有共用的安全性內容，可讓相同的安全性套用在對話中的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: A security context token involves a shared secret, which is used for message signing and encryption.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容權杖包含共用密碼，這個密碼會用於訊息簽署和加密。

trans-unit.source: The shared secret is used to create derived keys.
trans-unit.target: 共用秘密可以用來建立衍生的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: To maintain a high level of security through a lengthy conversation, new derived keys can be created periodically.
trans-unit.target: 為了在某段長時間的對話過程中，維持一貫連續的高度安全性，您可以定期建立新的衍生金鑰。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports client authentication.
<see langword="true" /> if the token supports client authentication; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果權杖支援用戶端驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports a Windows identity for authentication.
<see langword="true" /> if the token supports a Windows identity for authentication; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果權杖支援使用 Windows 身分識別進行驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports server authentication.
<see langword="true" /> if the token supports server authentication; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果權杖支援伺服器驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.
A text representation of this instance of the class.

The method displays the name of this class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會顯示這個類別的名稱、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A>。
